title: Candy Crush Saga
subTitle: الألغاز/مطابقة 3/الألعاب البسيطة
desc:
Enter the Candy Kingdom! Join millions of players in Candy Crush Saga, the iconic match-3 puzzle game from King. Enjoy sweet endless fun, with over a trillion matching levels played!
Match candies, create explosive combos, and solve delightful puzzles to advance through a world of sugary challenges. Outsmart tricky match-3 levels with clever strategies, earn tasty rewards, and unleash candy combos for a sugar blast that will leave you craving more!
BECOME THE MASTER OF THE CANDY KINGDOM
Enjoy a delicious variety of match-3 puzzles with new challenges added every two weeks! Each level brings fresh surprises and unique obstacles to master: blast chocolate, clear jelly, and spread sweetness in every matching move.
EXPERIENCE THE THRILL OF SWEET REWARDS
Spin the Daily Booster Wheel to win jelly fishes, boosters, and other sweet surprises that will bring you a sugar blast. Participate in special events and time-limited challenges to collect exclusive rewards and level up your candy-crushing game!
NEW WAYS TO MATCH CANDIES
Master unique matching game modes like Rainbow Rapids and Clear the Jelly, each offering exciting twists on the classic match-3 formula. Whether you're a casual player or a puzzle-solving professional, there’s a sweet adventure waiting for everyone.
A CANDY-COATED KINGDOM & COMMUNITY
Challenge friends to see who’s the ultimate Candy Crush match-3 master! Climb the leaderboard, share your progress, and team up for a sweeter match-3 experience. Play online or offline and connect with millions of fans worldwide for endless fun.
KEEP THE FUN GOING WITH MORE PUZZLE GAMES FROM KING
Looking for more fun in the Candy Kingdom? Explore other sugary match-3 games like Candy Crush Soda Saga and Candy Crush Friends Saga or discover other classics from King like Farm Heroes Saga and Pet Rescue Saga.
Candy Crush Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
By downloading Candy Crush Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions
Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
All Stars Tournament
Selected level 25+. 18+. In-game event from 12:00 EDT 20 March to 03:00 EDT 27 April, 2025. Participating countries only. Void where prohibited. Win the in-game event and receive an invite to the live contest 11-13 June in California for a chance to win a share of $1,000,000 USD. Requires US travel. T&Cs: to.king.com/terms. Candy Crush Saga contains optional in-game purchases. © 2025 King.com Ltd. “King”, “Candy Crush All Stars" and associated marks and logos are trademarks of King.com Ltd or related entities.
